title: One Piece Ep. 380 Recap: Bink's Brew. The Song That Connects the Past With the Present
author: Adult Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap and review of Episode 380, describing it as 'powerful and emotional' with a rating of 5/5. The reviewer praises the Funimation dub's musical adaptation.

title: 10 One Piece Episodes That Made Us Cry Ugly Tears

title: One Piece: The History of Bink's Sake
author: Game Rant
description: An in-depth article exploring the history and significance of Bink's Sake in One Piece, including its appearance in Episode 380 and composer Kohei Tanaka's goal to make it both lighthearted and sad.

title: One Piece Episodes: 380-381 End of Thriller Bark
